name: After The End (itch) (aceofswords)
description:
Made for Side Quest #4 for the "one room" prompt. It's outside-asset heavy; all I did was come up with game mechanics and writing and then try to cobble it all together. A single playthrough could only take a few minutes, but it has some elements of random generation that might make it worth at least a couple playthroughs in this state.

Asset list:
Dark UI
Polygon - Apocalypse Pack
Runemark Dialogue System
Simple Vector Icons
Ultimate Game Music Collection
